forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 10 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 11pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. Northwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
